title: ISic000179. Epitaph for Halaesina
body:
1Halaesina
2vixit ann(is)
3[⁦ - - - - - - - - - - ⁩]

1HALAESINA
2VIXITANN
3[⁦ - - - - - - - - - - ⁩]

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Gualtherus;
  • 2: Gualtherus: VIXIT.ANN.; Mommsen: VIXIT · ANN; it is impossible to know whether interpuncts were originally visible on the stone.

translation

Halaesa lived for [--] years [---]

commentary

Mommsen speculates that a line is missing below, containing the age (potentially in months and days also).
